alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Becker; East Otter Tail; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clay, Hubbard, northwestern Wadena, southeastern Norman, northwestern Otter Tail, south central Beltrami, northeastern Wilkin, Mahnomen, Becker and southern Clearwater Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 637 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Becida to near Hawley. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Park Rapids, Barnesville, Pelican Rapids, Hawley, Glyndon and Bagley. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 11 and 43. This includes areas in and around WE Fest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Becker; East Otter Tail; Hubbard; Mahnomen; Norman; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
